reviews.review:
15 years. 15 years without a sequel. Now I know about the post credits scene in Alyx but still, we're gonna have to wait like 5 years for HL3.

PROS:
-Pretty much everything HL2 and EP1 was good at

CONS:
-The total wait time for EP3/HL3 will probably be 2 decades

Pretty good so far! In my opinion, the start of the game isn't very good. I liked the big battle that happens with the rebels and antilions but other than that I didn't enjoy the beginning of the game too much. However, once I got past it I was enjoying it just as well as any other Half Life game!

Now put it at a car.

All right, you can drive. Hahaha

El final que nunca se consider√≥ como un final, este HL termin√≥ y durante a√±os daba esperanza a una entrega nueva de la serie, seguimos esperando y no sabemos que pas√≥, d√©cadas mas tarde. Este de los dos episodios es el mejor, y el m√°s complejo en cuanto a logros se refiere (el enano, pisar las larvas y evitar que rompan los edificios, pueden ser un dolor de cabeza incluso en dificultad f√°cil). Esta entrega trae consigo de nuevo mec√°nicas que se extra√±aron en el HL2 E1, como los veh√≠culos, que en este es el m√°s completo, incluyendo radar, incluso en el traje y mejoras varias, solo falt√≥ un arma en mi opini√≥n. 

Los enemigos (nuevos) son de los peores, las hormigas venenosas son bastante molestas y ni hablar de los raptores, son dur√≠simos y dif√≠ciles de matar. 

En conclusi√≥n, el juego solo extiende la maravilla de sus juegos previos, sigue siendo esplendido, y maravilloso, recomendado. Ojal√° veamos en un futuro una entrega m√°s para saber que quieren, que son y el destino de los consejeros (babosas flotantes chupa-cerebros) y que pasa con todos los personajes. Ya no necesariamente en un HL3, me conformo con el Project Borealis o Freeman Project. Por favor, terminen esta hermosa saga.

The Battle/Combat music is always hyping players up in this game. Story is extremely good, Having a Gnome with you throughout the game is not that annoying, but starts to get annoying when gnome keeps sliding out of the car, can we get a car seat or at least be able to put in the trunk. Everything is just Awesome.
This game is a little clunky but it's fun enough.
should be illegal to leave us on such a cliffhanger for so long

Hopefully we'll ever get to say Episode 3 was worth the wait.
Still, this would be one of the best endings in all video games if there weren't any more episodes, and I suppose there would be no further point in continuing the story of Half-Life if it weren't for solving many mysteries this game left us, maybe create some more, I hope I'll ever get to be wrong about that.
Definitely would recommend playing.
